title: Configure Namesilo domain for Github page
content:
use Namesilo domain for Github page1. buy a domain in namesilo2. manage the domain DNS1234567891011121314151617TYPE A    HOSTNAME: leave blank here    Address(add four times):     185.199.108.153    185.199.109.153    185.199.110.153    185.199.111.153TYPE CNAME    HOSTNAME: www    Address: xxx.github.ioTYPE AAAA(optional, for ipv6)    HOSTNAME: retain empty    Address:     2606:50c0:8000::153    2606:50c0:8001::153    2606:50c0:8002::153    2606:50c0:8003::153

3. verify domain in user site
profile->settings->Code, planning, and automation->Pages->Add a domain

enter the domain name

open Namesilo DNS management and add
 123TYPE TXT	HOSTNAME: _github-pages-challenge-....(your TXT record)	Address: asdd324fsdf(your code)

Verify until success


4. add custom domain in repository
xxx.github.io->settings->Pages->Custom domain
add your domain and save
click enforce HTTPS

title: Hello World6
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server1$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files1$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
